channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews

item.title: NYC nurses strike enters second day as hospitals move to fill labor gaps

item.title: Trump cancel meetings with Iranian officials and tells protesters 'help is on its way'
item.description: President Donald Trump says he has canceled meetings with Iranian officials and has told protesters “help is on its way.”
